pli-tv-bu-vb-sk21:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk21:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū khambhakatā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk21:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā khambhaṁ katvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
